quote: That is the way it is with a wound. The wound begins to close in on itself, to protect what is hurting so much. And once it is closed, you no longer see what is underneath, what started the pain.
quote_letters: THAT IS THE WAY IT IS WITH A WOUND THE WOUND BEGINS TO CLOSE IN ON ITSELF TO PROTECT WHAT IS HURTING SO MUCH AND ONCE IT IS CLOSED YOU NO LONGER SEE WHAT IS UNDERNEATH WHAT STARTED THE PAIN
source: Amy Tan, The Joy Luck Club
